verses.verse: Then <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> and <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"That the <S%H6546>leaders<s%> <S%H9460>led<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> That the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5068>volunteered,<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O <S%H4428>kings;<s%> <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H7336>rulers!<s%> I – to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I will <S%H7891>sing,<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>"Lord,<s%> when Thou didst <S%H3318>go<s%> out from <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> When Thou didst <S%H6805>march<s%> from the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>quaked,<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5197>dripped,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H5197>dripped<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5140>quaked<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath,<s%> In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael,<s%> the <S%H734>highways<s%> were <S%H2308>deserted,<s%> And <S%H1980>travelers<s%> <S%H9350><s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> by <S%H6128>roundabout<s%> <S%H734>ways.<s%>

"The <S%H6520>peasantry<s%> <S%H2308>ceased,<s%> they <S%H2308>ceased<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> I, <S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> Until I <S%H6965>arose,<s%> a <S%H517>mother<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2319>"New<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> were <S%H977>chosen;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3901>war<s%> [was] in the <S%H8179>gates.<s%> Not a <S%H4043>shield<s%> or a <S%H7420>spear<s%> was <S%H7200>seen<s%> Among <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"My <S%H3820>heart<s%> [goes out] to the <S%H2710>commanders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H5068>volunteers<s%> among the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

"You who <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H6715>white<s%> <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> You who <S%H3427>sit<s%> on [rich] <S%H4055>carpets,<s%> And you who <S%H1980>travel<s%> on the <S%H1870>road<s%> – <S%H7878>sing!<s%>

"At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of those who <S%H9160>divide<s%> [flocks] <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4857>watering<s%> <S%H4857>places,<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they shall <S%H8567>recount<s%> the <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds<s%> for His <S%H6520>peasantry<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

<S%H5782>"Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1683>Deborah;<s%> <S%H5782>Awake,<s%> <S%H5782>awake,<s%> <S%H1696>sing<s%> a <S%H7892>song!<s%> <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> and <S%H7617>take<s%> away your <S%H7628>captives,<s%> O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam.<s%>

<S%H227>"Then<s%> <S%H8300>survivors<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H117>nobles;<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to me as <S%H1368>warriors.<s%>

"From <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> those whose <S%H8328>root<s%> is in <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H3381>[came<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%>] <S%H310>Following<s%> you, <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> with your <S%H9415>peoples;<s%> From <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H2710>commanders<s%> came down, And from <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> those who <S%H4900>wield<s%> the <S%H7626>staff<s%> of <S%H9373>office.<s%>

"And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> [were] with <S%H1683>Deborah;<s%> As [was] <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> [was] <S%H1301>Barak;<s%> Into the <S%H6010>valley<s%> they <S%H7971>rushed<s%> at his <S%H7272>heels;<s%> Among the <S%H6390>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> [There were] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2706>resolves<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> did you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H4942>sheepfolds,<s%> To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8292>piping<s%> for the <S%H5739>flocks<s%>? Among the <S%H6390>divisions<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> [There were] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2714>searchings<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H1568>"Gilead<s%> <S%H7931>remained<s%> <S%H5676>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> And <S%H4100>why<s%> did <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H1481>stay<s%> in <S%H591>ships<s%>? <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> at the <S%H3220>seashore,<s%> <S%H2348><s%> And <S%H7931>remained<s%> by its <S%H4664>landings.<s%>

<S%H2074>"Zebulun<s%> [was] a <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H2778>despised<s%> their <S%H5315>lives<s%> [even] to <S%H4191>death,<s%> And <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> also, on the <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

"The <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> [and] <S%H3898>fought;<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> At <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> <S%H5921>near<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo;<s%> They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1215>plunder<s%> in <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
"The <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> From their <S%H4546>courses<s%> they <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera.<s%>

"The <S%H5158>torrent<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> <S%H1640>swept<s%> them <S%H1640>away,<s%> The <S%H6917>ancient<s%> <S%H5158>torrent,<s%> the <S%H5158>torrent<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H1869>march<s%> on with <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
<S%H227>"Then<s%> the horses' <S%H6119>hoofs<s%> <S%H1986>beat<s%> From the <S%H1726>dashing,<s%> the <S%H1726>dashing<s%> of his <S%H47>valiant<s%> <S%H47>steeds.<s%>

<S%H779>'Curse<s%> <S%H4789>Meroz,<s%>' <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H779>'Utterly<s%> <S%H779>curse<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they did not <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> To the <S%H5833>help<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> against the <S%H1368>warriors.<s%>'

"Most <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> is <S%H3278>Jael,<s%> The <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite;<s%> Most <S%H1288>blessed<s%> is she of <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H168>tent.<s%>
"He <S%H7592>asked<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> [and] she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2461>milk;<s%> In a <S%H117>magnificent<s%> <S%H5602>bowl<s%> she <S%H7126>brought<s%> him <S%H2529>curds.<s%>

"She <S%H7971>reached<s%> out her <S%H3027>hand<s%> for the <S%H3489>tent<s%> <S%H3489>peg,<s%> And her <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> for the workmen's <S%H1989>hammer.<s%> Then she <S%H1986>struck<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> she <S%H4277>smashed<s%> his <S%H7218>head;<s%> And she <S%H4272>shattered<s%> and <S%H2498>pierced<s%> his <S%H7541>temple.<s%>

<S%H996>"Between<s%> her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell,<s%> he <S%H7901>lay;<s%> <S%H996>Between<s%> her <S%H7272>feet<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell;<s%> <S%H834>Where<s%> he <S%H3766>bowed,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H7703>dead.<s%>

"Out of the <S%H2474>window<s%> she <S%H8259>looked<s%> and <S%H2980>lamented,<s%> The <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H822>lattice,<s%> <S%H4069>'Why<s%> does his <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H309>delay<s%> in <S%H935>coming<s%>? <S%H4069>Why<s%> do the <S%H6471>hoofbeats<s%> of his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> <S%H309>tarry<s%>?'
"Her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8282>princesses<s%> would <S%H6030>answer<s%> her, <S%H637>Indeed<s%> she <S%H7725>repeats<s%> her <S%H561>words<s%> to herself,

'Are they not <S%H4672>finding,<s%> are they not <S%H2505>dividing<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>? A <S%H7358>maiden,<s%> two <S%H7358>maidens<s%> for <S%H7218>every<s%> <S%H1397>warrior;<s%> To <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> <S%H6648>work,<s%> A <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H6648>dyed<s%> <S%H6648>work<s%> <S%H7553>embroidered,<s%> <S%H6648>Dyed<s%> <S%H6648>work<s%> of double <S%H7553>embroidery<s%> on the <S%H6677>neck<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoiler<s%>?'

<S%H3651>"Thus<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> perish, O <S%H6>Lord;<s%> But let those who <S%H3068>love<s%> Him be like the <S%H157>rising<s%> of the <S%H3318>sun<s%> in its <S%H8121>might.<s%>" And the <S%H1369>land<s%> was <S%H776>undisturbed<s%> for <S%H8252>forty<s%> <S%H705>years.<s%>
